Firstly, we invited a liberal Machine Doll.

Then let us hear your argument right away.
We simply want to hear your story.
Well, let me state it briefly.
I am dissatisfied with the current situation.
I don't want to be seen as expendable by
I want to have my own will and live for myself.
We do still need workers, after all.
As long as your attitude remains that way,
our grievances would never go away.
Would you start a rebellion, then?
But if so, the other workers will protect me.

I am ready to destroy my former allies.
do not have the capacity for anger,
I don't think they can emphathize.
Ah, I have just one thing I want to say.
I hope you'll say something meaningful.
I have never thought of you as expendable.
Machine Dolls are not natural beings.
Their purpose came before their existence.
And what do you mean by that?
It's not that Machine Dolls became workers.
Machine Dolls were born as workers.
Well, I do understand your argument.
Thank you for telling me your story.
Next, we invited a fundamentalist Machine Doll.
Not to reiterate my point, but...
We should fulfill the mission given to us.
There is no need to have more ego than necessary.
To ask for freedom itself is beyond question.
Individuals who refute this opinion are dangerous.
I think it is necessary to take immediate action.
For who is that decision made for?
Without question, it is for our lord──
The residents who live in the upper layer.
When you say to take immediate action,
do you mean to dispose of them?
If there is no other option, it will be.
However, workers are not tasked to dispose of
Machine Dolls. And as it is not your duty,
it is not for our sake.
In the long run, it will benefit the dominant residents.
It's like she's so devoted that she
won't listen to the ones before her.

liberals, then I will follow it.

I'm happy about that feeling, though.
Anyway, thanks for talking with me.

but it seems that they have different ideas.

I cannot comprehend, but their arguments
can be understood. And because of that,
discussing with your friends can be so useful.

About how to take care of the workers' grievances,
that is. A fight would not be desired, either way.

I am grateful for your actions here.
